title: Making their senses make sense
creator_credit: Center for Developmental and Learning Disorders and Elsie McKibbin
brief_description: Discusses methods to care for and explores different activities to help teach children who are perceptually disabled. These children may find difficulty in learning, refining motor skills, and coping with safety aspects in everyday life.
